snippet.title: Roots Devour | Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Rewinding Games's new indie game "Roots Devour" is now available for free on Steam!
🩸"Roots Devour" is a Lovecraftian-themed indie game where you play as a newborn ancient god, traversing a silent and eerie forest in search of offerings to connect with and consume.
🦉The game combines strategy card mechanics with simulation elements. You'll explore the unknown forest, extend your roots, absorb blood and resources, build your deck, and use strategic planning to overcome challenges and uncover hidden truths.

The demo features the first chapter of the game, including the Deep Forest, the first map, and The Alter, the skill system. Estimated playtime ranges from 40 to 150 minutes, with certain elements offering replayability! 
#indiegame #lovecraftian #strategygames #strategy
